testCase.name: Code System Unit Test should be defined

Code System Unit Test should add new code system
User Unit Test should be defined
User Unit Test should create a new user
User Unit Test should not create a new user if email is invalid
User Unit Test should not create a user if password is less than 6 characters
User Unit Test should get a user by field
User Unit Test should get one user by
User Unit Test should get one user
User Unit Test should login a user with email
User Unit Test should login a user with phone
User Unit Test should not login with invalid email
User Unit Test should not login with invalid password
User Unit Test should log a user out
User Unit Test should generate JWT token
User Unit Test should throw error generating JWT token
User Unit Test should decode JWT token
User Unit Test should throw error while decoding JWT token
User Unit Test should update user password
User Unit Test should not update user password if old password is incorrect
User Unit Test should not update user password if password validation fails
User Unit Test should not update user password if the user does not exist
User Unit Test should not reset user password if an email is not provided
User Unit Test should not reset user password if a user with the email does not exist
User Unit Test should reset user password if an email is provided and a user with the email exist
User Unit Test should update user
User Unit Test should check for existing user
